swissd.jsx

for After Effects

Swissd is an After Effects script for creating fixed width text layouts.

During a workshop I gave called "Typography And Automation" Julian a.k.a. @natael came up with the idea of creating fixed width layouts in InDesign. His result, also called swissd, was so interesting I took it on to create something similar for After Effects. I did not port his code. I wrote my own.
It is published on aescipts.com and open source under MIT license.
